    403  310b							;---------------------------------------------------------------
    404  310b		       85 6a		      sta	HMOVE	; 3
      0  310d					      SLEEP	3	; 3 =	6
      1  310d				   .CYCLES    SET	3
      2  310d
      3  310d				  -	      IF	.CYCLES < 2
      4  310d				  -	      ECHO	"MACRO ERROR: 'SLEEP': Duration must be > 1"
      5  310d				  -	      ERR
      6  310d					      ENDIF
      7  310d
      8  310d					      IF	.CYCLES & 1
      9  310d					      IFNCONST	NO_ILLEGAL_OPCODES
     10  310d		       04 00		      nop	0
     11  310f				  -	      ELSE
     12  310f				  -	      bit	VSYNC
     13  310f					      ENDIF
     14  310f				   .CYCLES    SET	.CYCLES - 3
     15  310f					      ENDIF
     16  310f
     17  310f				  -	      REPEAT	.CYCLES / 2
     18  310f				  -	      nop
     19  310f					      REPEND

    439  313b				   Score2x4Fix SUBROUTINE
      0  313b					      DEFINE_SUBROUTINE	DrawDigits2x4
      1  313b		       00 06	   BANK_DrawDigits2x4 =	_CURRENT_BANK
      2  313b					      SUBROUTINE
      3  313b				   DrawDigits2x4
    441  313b
    442  313b
    443  313b							; Subroutine by Thomas Jentzsch.  Magic!
    444  313b							; This subroutine draws two 4-digit scores on the screen, side-by-side. Amazing!
    445  313b
    446  313b		       20 ee f1 	      jsr	PrepareDrawDigits	;56 = 56    @63
    447  313e
    448  313e		       85 6a		      sta	HMOVE	; 3
      0  3140					      SLEEP	4	; 4  =  7
      1  3140				   .CYCLES    SET	4
      2  3140
      3  3140				  -	      IF	.CYCLES < 2
      4  3140				  -	      ECHO	"MACRO ERROR: 'SLEEP': Duration must be > 1"
      5  3140				  -	      ERR
      6  3140					      ENDIF
      7  3140
      8  3140				  -	      IF	.CYCLES & 1
      9  3140				  -	      IFNCONST	NO_ILLEGAL_OPCODES
     10  3140				  -	      nop	0
     11  3140				  -	      ELSE
     12  3140				  -	      bit	VSYNC
     13  3140				  -	      ENDIF
     14  3140				  -.CYCLES    SET	.CYCLES - 3
     15  3140					      ENDIF
     16  3140
     17  3140					      REPEAT	.CYCLES / 2
     18  3140		       ea		      nop
     17  3140					      REPEND
     18  3141		       ea		      nop
     19  3142					      REPEND
    450  3142

    514  3199				   Score3x2Fix SUBROUTINE

    519  319d		       20 f4 f1 	      jsr	PrepareDrawDigits2	;49 = 53    @60

     10  31b8		       04 00		      nop	0
     11  31ba				  -	      ELSE
     12  31ba				  -	      bit	VSYNC
     13  31ba					      ENDIF
     14  31ba				   .CYCLES    SET	.CYCLES - 3
     15  31ba					      ENDIF
     16  31ba
     17  31ba					      REPEAT	.CYCLES / 2
     18  31ba		       ea		      nop
     19  31bb					      REPEND
    536  31bb		       85 5b		      sta	GRP0	; 3
    537  31bd				   SMCAVE
    538  31bd		       b9 8e f0 	      lda	CharA-1,y	; 4
    539  31c0		       85 6b		      sta	HMCLR	; 3 = 10    @40
    540  31c2		       86 5c		      stx	GRP1	; 3 =	3    @43
    541  31c4		       85 5b		      sta	GRP0	; 3
    542  31c6				   SMLEVEL
    543  31c6		       b9 94 f3 	      lda	OneR-1,y	; 4
    544  31c9		       85 5c		      sta	GRP1	; 3 = 10    @53
    545  31cb
    546  31cb		       88		      dey		; 2
      0  31cc					      CHECKPAGE_BNE	LoopDraw3x2	;2/3= 5    @58
      8  31cc					      LIST	ON
      9  31cc		       d0 d6		      bne	LoopDraw3x2
    548  31ce							;					     @57
      0  31ce					      SLEEP	3	; 3
      1  31ce				   .CYCLES    SET	3
      2  31ce
      3  31ce				  -	      IF	.CYCLES < 2
      4  31ce				  -	      ECHO	"MACRO ERROR: 'SLEEP': Duration must be > 1"
      5  31ce				  -	      ERR
      6  31ce					      ENDIF
      7  31ce
      8  31ce					      IF	.CYCLES & 1
      9  31ce					      IFNCONST	NO_ILLEGAL_OPCODES
     10  31ce		       04 00		      nop	0
     11  31d0				  -	      ELSE
     12  31d0				  -	      bit	VSYNC
     13  31d0					      ENDIF
     14  31d0				   .CYCLES    SET	.CYCLES - 3
     15  31d0					      ENDIF
     16  31d0
     17  31d0				  -	      REPEAT	.CYCLES / 2
     18  31d0				  -	      nop
     19  31d0					      REPEND
    550  31d0		       4c 36 f1 	      jmp	ExitDigitKernel6	; 9 = 12    @69  'BEQ' WAS A DANGEROUS ASSUMPTION OF STATUS FLAG!!
    551  31d3
    552  31d3
    553  31d3							;------------------------------------------------------------------------------
      0  31d3					      DEFINE_SUBROUTINE	DrawDigits
      1  31d3		       00 06	   BANK_DrawDigits =	_CURRENT_BANK
      2  31d3					      SUBROUTINE
      3  31d3				   DrawDigits
    555  31d3
    556  31d3				   VblankLoopBD
    557  31d3		       ac 84 02 	      ldy	INTIM
    558  31d6		       d0 fb		      bne	VblankLoopBD
    559  31d8
    560  31d8		       84 41		      sty	VBLANK	; 3	     <-- 0
    561  31da		       a5 c8		      lda	scoringFlags	; 3
    562  31dc		       29 03		      and	#DISPLAY_FLAGS	; 2
    563  31de		       aa		      tax		; 2
    564  31df
    565  31df							;    DEFINE_SUBROUTINE DrawDigit2
    566  31df							;
    567  31df							;    ; Generic interface to scoring routine
    568  31df
    569  31df		       bd ea f1 	      lda	ScoreKernelLo,x	; 4
    570  31e2
    571  31e2		       85 42		      sta	WSYNC	; 3
    572  31e4							;---------------------------------------------------------------
    573  31e4		       8d e8 f5 	      sta	SMJUMP+1+RAM_WRITE	; 4
    574  31e7				   SMJUMP
    575  31e7		       4c 00 f1 	      jmp	DrawDigits1x6	; 3 =	7    @07
    576  31ea
    577  31ea				   ScoreKernelLo
    578  31ea		       3b		      .byte.b	<Score2x4Fix	; diamonds, time
    579  31eb		       00		      .byte.b	<Score1x6Fix	; score
    580  31ec		       99		      .byte.b	<Score3x2Fix	; player, lives, cave/level
    581  31ed		       00		      .byte.b	<Score1x6Fix	; high score
    582  31ee
      0  31ee					      CHECKPAGE	DrawDigits1x6	; AD: the jump requires all in the same page, so let's enforce that
      8  31ee					      LIST	ON
    584  31ee
    585  31ee							;------------------------------------------------------------------------------
      0  31ee					      DEFINE_SUBROUTINE	PrepareDrawDigits
      1  31ee		       00 06	   BANK_PrepareDrawDigits =	_CURRENT_BANK
      2  31ee					      SUBROUTINE
      3  31ee				   PrepareDrawDigits
    587  31ee							;					     @13
    588  31ee		       a0 d1		      ldy	#$d1	; 2
    589  31f0		       a9 13		      lda	#%010011	; 2
    590  31f2		       85 66		      sta	VDELP1	; 3 =	7
    591  31f4				   PrepareDrawDigits2		;	    @17/20
    592  31f4		       84 65		      sty	VDELP0	; 3 =	3
    593  31f6
    594  31f6		       85 45		      sta	NUSIZ1	; 3
    595  31f8		       85 44		      sta	NUSIZ0	; 3 =	6
    596  31fa
    597  31fa		       8d 4b 00 	      sta.w	REFP0	; 4		     bit 3 is always clear
    598  31fd		       85 50		      sta	RESP0	; 3	     @33/36
    599  31ff		       85 51		      sta	RESP1	; 3 = 10    @36/39
    600  3201
    601  3201		       84 60		      sty	HMP0	; 3
    602  3203		       c8		      iny		; 2
    603  3204		       84 61		      sty	HMP1	; 3 =	8
    604  3206				   SMCOLOR
    605  3206		       a0 0e		      ldy	#SCORE_COL	; 2
    606  3208		       84 46		      sty	COLUP0	; 3
    607  320a		       84 47		      sty	COLUP1	; 3 =	8
    608  320c
    609  320c		       a0 07		      ldy	#DIGIT_H	; 2
    610  320e		       60		      rts		; 6 =	8
    611  320f							; total: 27
    612  320f
    613  320f
    614  320f							;------------------------------------------------------------------------------
      0  320f					      DEFINE_SUBROUTINE	UpdateScore
      1  320f		       00 06	   BANK_UpdateScore =	_CURRENT_BANK
      2  320f					      SUBROUTINE
      3  320f				   UpdateScore
    616  320f							; a = added score value
    617  320f
    618  320f							; initially switch to score:
    619  320f		       a0 01		      ldy	#DISPLAY_SCORE
    620  3211		       84 df		      sty	newDisplay
    621  3213
    622  3213		       18		      clc
    623  3214		       f8		      sed
    624  3215		       a0 04		      ldy	#SM_OFS_SCORE
    625  3217				   .loopScore
    626  3217		       79 dd f3 	      adc	ScoreCurrent-SM_OFS_SCORE,y
    627  321a		       99 dd f7 	      sta	ScoreCurrent-SM_OFS_SCORE+RAM_WRITE,y
    628  321d		       08		      php
    629  321e							; *** bonus life every 500 points: ***
    630  321e		       c0 05		      cpy	#SM_OFS_SCORE+1
    631  3220		       d0 1c		      bne	.skipBonusLife
    632  3222		       aa		      tax
    633  3223
    634  3223		       29 0f		      and	#$0f
    635  3225		       f0 04		      beq	.bonusLife	; 000?
    636  3227		       c9 05		      cmp	#$05
    637  3229		       d0 12		      bne	.noBonusLife	; 500?
    638  322b				   .bonusLife
    639  322b							; add extra life, limited to 9
    640  322b
    641  322b		       a5 ab		      lda	MenCurrent
    642  322d		       29 0f		      and	#$0f
    643  322f		       c9 09		      cmp	#9
    644  3231		       b0 0a		      bcs	.noBonusLife
    645  3233		       e6 ab		      inc	MenCurrent
    646  3235
    647  3235							; bonus life has priority over score:
    648  3235		       a9 02		      lda	#DISPLAY_LIVES
    649  3237		       85 df		      sta	newDisplay
    650  3239		       a9 ff		      lda	#EXTRA_LIFE_TIMER
    651  323b		       85 c6		      sta	extraLifeTimer
    652  323d
    653  323d				   .noBonusLife
    654  323d		       8a		      txa
    655  323e				   .skipBonusLife
    656  323e		       20 3d f3 	      jsr	SetupBCDPtr
    657  3241		       28		      plp
    658  3242		       a9 00		      lda	#0
    659  3244		       b0 d1		      bcs	.loopScore
    660  3246		       d8		      cld
    661  3247
    662  3247							; switch display
    663  3247		       a5 c8		      lda	scoringFlags
    664  3249		       29 03		      and	#DISPLAY_FLAGS
    665  324b		       c5 df		      cmp	newDisplay	; lower priority than current?
    666  324d		       f0 08		      beq	.restartTime
    667  324f		       b0 0a		      bcs	.skipNew
    668  3251		       45 c8		      eor	scoringFlags	; remove existing score mode
    669  3253		       05 df		      ora	newDisplay	; switch to new score mode
    670  3255		       85 c8		      sta	scoringFlags
    671  3257				   .restartTime
    672  3257		       a9 3c		      lda	#SCORING_TIMER	; maybe always restart timer?
    673  3259		       85 c7		      sta	scoringTimer
    674  325b				   .skipNew
    675  325b
    676  325b		       60		      rts
    677  325c
    678  325c							;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
    679  325c
      0  325c					      DEFINE_SUBROUTINE	SwapPlayers
      1  325c		       00 06	   BANK_SwapPlayers =	_CURRENT_BANK
      2  325c					      SUBROUTINE
      3  325c				   SwapPlayers
    681  325c
    682  325c							; assume no new high score:
    683  325c		       a0 ff		      ldy	#-1
    684  325e		       84 e2		      sty	highScoreSK
    685  3260
    686  3260							; update highscore after last live:
    687  3260		       a5 ab		      lda	MenCurrent
    688  3262		       29 0f		      and	#$0f	; player has lives left?
    689  3264		       d0 1c		      bne	.playerAlive	; YES, so we don't check high score
    690  3266
    691  3266							; check for a new high score:
    692  3266							;	  ldy #-1
    693  3266		       18		      clc		; score has to be at least 1 bigger!
    694  3267				   .loopCheckHighScore
    695  3267		       c8		      iny
    696  3268		       b9 e1 f3 	      lda	ScoreCurrent,y
    697  326b		       f9 eb f3 	      sbc	HighScore,y
    698  326e		       98		      tya
    699  326f		       49 02		      eor	#2
    700  3271		       d0 f4		      bne	.loopCheckHighScore
    701  3273		       90 0d		      bcc	.noHighScore
    702  3275
    703  3275							; new high score, update:
    704  3275		       a2 04		      ldx	#5-1
    705  3277				   .loopSetHighScore
    706  3277		       bd e1 f3 	      lda	ScoreCurrent,x
    707  327a		       9d eb f7 	      sta	HighScore+RAM_WRITE,x
    708  327d		       95 e2		      sta	highScoreSK,x
    709  327f		       ca		      dex
    710  3280		       10 f5		      bpl	.loopSetHighScore
    711  3282				   .noHighScore
    712  3282
    713  3282				   .playerAlive
    714  3282		       a5 ab		      lda	MenCurrent
    715  3284		       29 f0		      and	#$f0	; other player has lives left?
    716  3286		       f0 21		      beq	.otherPlayerDead	; NO, so we don't swap scores
    717  3288
    718  3288							; save the current player variables to the player's backup:
    719  3288		       a0 02		      ldy	#3-1
    720  328a				   .swapScore
    721  328a		       be e6 f3 	      ldx	PlayerScores,y
    722  328d		       b9 e1 f3 	      lda	ScoreCurrent,y
    723  3290		       99 e6 f7 	      sta	PlayerScores+RAM_WRITE,y
    724  3293		       8a		      txa
    725  3294		       99 e1 f7 	      sta	ScoreCurrent+RAM_WRITE,y
    726  3297		       88		      dey
    727  3298		       10 f0		      bpl	.swapScore
    728  329a
    729  329a							; swap cave and level:
    730  329a		       a2 01		      ldx	#1
    731  329c				   .loopCaveLevel
    732  329c		       bc e9 f3 	      ldy	PlayerCave,x
    733  329f		       b5 b0		      lda	cave,x
    734  32a1		       9d e9 f7 	      sta	PlayerCave+RAM_WRITE,x
    735  32a4		       94 b0		      sty	cave,x
    736  32a6		       ca		      dex
    737  32a7		       10 f3		      bpl	.loopCaveLevel
    738  32a9
    739  32a9				   .otherPlayerDead
    740  32a9		       60		      rts
    741  32aa
    742  32aa							;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
    743  32aa
    744  32aa				   HighScoreColTbl
    745  32aa		       44 44		      .byte.b	SCORE_COL_HIGH_NTSC, SCORE_COL_HIGH_NTSC
    746  32ac		       66 66		      .byte.b	SCORE_COL_HIGH_PAL, SCORE_COL_HIGH_PAL
    747  32ae
      0  32ae					      DEFINE_SUBROUTINE	GeneralScoringSetups
      1  32ae		       00 06	   BANK_GeneralScoringSetups =	_CURRENT_BANK
      2  32ae					      SUBROUTINE
      3  32ae				   GeneralScoringSetups
    749  32ae
    750  32ae		       a0 04		      ldy	#SM_OFS_SCORE
    751  32b0				   .loopScore2
    752  32b0		       a5 c8		      lda	scoringFlags
    753  32b2		       29 03		      and	#DISPLAY_FLAGS
    754  32b4		       c9 03		      cmp	#DISPLAY_HIGH
    755  32b6		       a6 81		      ldx	Platform
    756  32b8		       bd aa f2 	      lda	HighScoreColTbl,x
    757  32bb		       aa		      tax
    758  32bc		       b9 e7 f3 	      lda	HighScore-SM_OFS_SCORE,y
    759  32bf		       b0 05		      bcs	.showHighScore
    760  32c1		       a2 0e		      ldx	#SCORE_COL
    761  32c3		       b9 dd f3 	      lda	ScoreCurrent-SM_OFS_SCORE,y
    762  32c6				   .showHighScore
    763  32c6		       8e 07 f6 	      stx	SMCOLOR+1+RAM_WRITE
    764  32c9		       20 3d f3 	      jsr	SetupBCDPtr
    765  32cc		       c0 07		      cpy	#SM_OFS_SCORE+3
    766  32ce		       90 e0		      bcc	.loopScore2
    767  32d0
    768  32d0							; display number of lives in leftmost digit of middle score XX nX XX
    769  32d0
    770  32d0		       a5 ab		      lda	MenCurrent
    771  32d2		       29 0f		      and	#$0f
    772  32d4		       a8		      tay
    773  32d5		       b9 00 f0 	      lda	DigitVectorLOr,y
    774  32d8		       8d b6 f5 	      sta	SMMEN+1+RAM_WRITE
    775  32db
    776  32db							; modify player number pointer (Xp XX XX)
    777  32db
    778  32db		       a4 9e		      ldy	whichPlayer
    779  32dd		       b9 01 f0 	      lda	DigitVectorLOr+1,y
    780  32e0		       8d ae f5 	      sta	SMPLAYER+1+RAM_WRITE
    781  32e3
    782  32e3							; fall through
    783  32e3
    784  32e3							;    ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
    785  32e3
    786  32e3							; modify cave character pointer (XX XX cX)
    787  32e3
    788  32e3		       a2 e8		      ldx	#<IntermissionL-1
    789  32e5		       a5 b2		      lda	caveDisplay
    790  32e7		       c9 80		      cmp	#$80
    791  32e9		       29 1f		      and	#$1f
    792  32eb		       a8		      tay
    793  32ec		       b0 05		      bcs	.intermission
    794  32ee		       be 27 f0 	      ldx	CharVectorLO,y
    795  32f1		       a4 b1		      ldy	level
    796  32f3				   .intermission
    797  32f3		       8e be f5 	      stx	SMCAVE+1+RAM_WRITE
    798  32f6
    799  32f6							; modify level number pointer (XX XX Xl)
    800  32f6
    801  32f6		       b9 01 f0 	      lda	DigitVectorLOr+1,y
    802  32f9		       8d c7 f5 	      sta	SMLEVEL+1+RAM_WRITE
    803  32fc

    807  32ff		       4c 34 f3 	      jmp	SetupTimePtr	; modify time pointers
    808  3302

    830  3302

      2  3302					      SUBROUTINE

    833  3302
    834  3302							;sok jsr UpdateScore		      ;looong!
    835  3302
    836  3302							;------------------------------------------------------------------------------
      0  3302					      DEFINE_SUBROUTINE	SetupDiamondsPtr
      1  3302		       00 06	   BANK_SetupDiamondsPtr =	_CURRENT_BANK
      2  3302					      SUBROUTINE
      3  3302				   SetupDiamondsPtr
    838  3302							; Show current diamond counter in the top left
    839  3302
    840  3302		       a0 00		      ldy	#SM_OFS_DIAMONDS
    841  3304		       a5 b6		      lda	diamondsNeeded
    842  3306		       20 3d f3 	      jsr	SetupBCDPtr
    843  3309
    844  3309		       a9 b0		      lda	#ID_DIAMOND<<4	; if no extra diamonds, display the normal icon
    845  330b		       24 c8		      bit	scoringFlags	;
    846  330d		       10 2e		      bpl	SetupBCDPtr
    847  330f		       a9 c0		      lda	#ID_EXTRA<<4	; otherwise, display the extra icon
    848  3311		       50 2a		      bvc	SetupBCDPtr
    849  3313		       09 01		      ora	#1	; display 1xx diamonds
    850  3315		       d0 26		      bne	SetupBCDPtr	; unconditional
    851  3317
    852  3317							;------------------------------------------------------------------------------
      0  3317					      DEFINE_SUBROUTINE	DrawTime
      1  3317		       00 06	   BANK_DrawTime =	_CURRENT_BANK
      2  3317					      SUBROUTINE
      3  3317				   DrawTime
    854  3317
    855  3317							; mid-digit-change, but we may be required to flash/display
    856  3317		       a0 02		      ldy	#SM_OFS_TIME
    857  3319		       a5 ba		      lda	caveTimeHi
    858  331b		       d0 17		      bne	BGOK
    859  331d		       a5 b9		      lda	caveTime
    860  331f		       c9 0a		      cmp	#RED_TIME_WARNING
    861  3321		       b0 11		      bcs	BGOK
    862  3323		       a5 bb		      lda	caveTimeFrac
    863  3325		       69 20		      adc	#$20
    864  3327		       29 60		      and	#$60	; 75% on, 25% off
    865  3329		       d0 09		      bne	BGOK
    866  332b
    867  332b		       a9 aa		      lda	#ID_BLANK<<4|ID_BLANK
    868  332d		       20 3d f3 	      jsr	SetupBCDPtr
    869  3330		       a9 da		      lda	#ID_CLOCK<<4|ID_BLANK
    870  3332		       d0 09		      bne	SetupBCDPtr	; ASSUMES ID_BLANK != 0
    871  3334				   BGOK
    872  3334							;------------------------------------------------------------------------------
      0  3334					      DEFINE_SUBROUTINE	SetupTimePtr
      1  3334		       00 06	   BANK_SetupTimePtr =	_CURRENT_BANK
      2  3334					      SUBROUTINE
      3  3334				   SetupTimePtr
    874  3334
    875  3334		       a5 b9		      lda	caveTime
    876  3336		       20 3d f3 	      jsr	SetupBCDPtr
    877  3339		       a5 ba		      lda	caveTime+1
    878  333b		       09 d0		      ora	#ID_CLOCK<<4
    879  333d
    880  333d							; fall through
    881  333d
    882  333d							;------------------------------------------------------------------------------
      0  333d					      DEFINE_SUBROUTINE	SetupBCDPtr
      1  333d		       00 06	   BANK_SetupBCDPtr =	_CURRENT_BANK
      2  333d					      SUBROUTINE
      3  333d				   SetupBCDPtr
    884  333d
    885  333d							; a = BCD value
    886  333d							; y = SM table offset
    887  333d
    888  333d		       48		      pha
    889  333e		       29 0f		      and	#$0f
    890  3340		       aa		      tax
    891  3341		       bd 0e f0 	      lda	DigitVectorLO,x	; low nibble: left aligned chars
    892  3344		       be 19 f0 	      ldx	SMTblLSB,y
    893  3347		       9d 00 f5 	      sta	SM_BASE+RAM_WRITE,x
    894  334a		       68		      pla
    895  334b		       4a		      lsr
    896  334c		       4a		      lsr
    897  334d		       4a		      lsr
    898  334e		       4a		      lsr
    899  334f		       aa		      tax
    900  3350		       bd 00 f0 	      lda	DigitVectorLOr,x	; high nibble: right aligned chars
    901  3353		       be 20 f0 	      ldx	SMTblMSB,y
    902  3356		       9d 00 f5 	      sta	SM_BASE+RAM_WRITE,x
    903  3359
    904  3359		       c8		      iny
    905  335a
    906  335a		       a5 c3		      lda	ROM_Bank
    907  335c				   RTS
    908  335c		       60		      rts
    909  335d
      0  335d					      OPTIONAL_PAGEBREAK	"LeftDigits", (DIGIT_H*13)	; cannot index across page!
     10  335d					      LIST	ON
    911  335d
    912  335d				  -	      IF	<. = 0
    913  335d				  -	      .byte	0	; required!
    914  335d					      ENDIF
    915  335d
    916  335d				   BLANKR
    917  335d		       00 00 00 00*	      .ds	DIGIT_H, 0
    918  3364
    919  3364				   DequalsR
    920  3364		       10		      .byte.b	%00010000

   1062  33b6
      0  33b6					      DEFINE_SUBROUTINE	GameInitialise
      1  33b6		       00 06	   BANK_GameInitialise =	_CURRENT_BANK
      2  33b6					      SUBROUTINE
      3  33b6				   GameInitialise
   1064  33b6
   1065  33b6							; copy loaded SK high score into scoring RAM:
   1066  33b6		       a2 02		      ldx	#3-1
   1067  33b8				   .loopCopyHighScore
   1068  33b8		       b5 e2		      lda	highScoreSK,x
   1069  33ba		       c9 ff		      cmp	#$ff
   1070  33bc		       f0 06		      beq	.noSaveKey
   1071  33be		       9d eb f7 	      sta	HighScore+RAM_WRITE,x
   1072  33c1		       ca		      dex
   1073  33c2		       10 f4		      bpl	.loopCopyHighScore
   1074  33c4				   .noSaveKey
   1075  33c4
   1076  33c4							; clear both players scores
   1077  33c4		       a0 05		      ldy	#2*3-1
   1078  33c6		       a9 00		      lda	#0
   1079  33c8				   .loopClearScore
   1080  33c8		       99 e1 f7 	      sta	ScoreCurrent+RAM_WRITE,y
   1081  33cb		       88		      dey
   1082  33cc		       10 fa		      bpl	.loopClearScore
   1083  33ce
   1084  33ce							; copy cave and level for other player and SaveKey:
   1085  33ce		       a5 b0		      lda	cave
   1086  33d0		       8d e9 f7 	      sta	PlayerCave+RAM_WRITE
   1087  33d3		       a5 e5		      lda	startCave
   1088  33d5		       8d e4 f7 	      sta	StartCave+RAM_WRITE
   1089  33d8		       a5 b1		      lda	level
   1090  33da		       8d ea f7 	      sta	PlayerLevel+RAM_WRITE
   1091  33dd		       8d e5 f7 	      sta	StartLevel+RAM_WRITE
   1092  33e0		       60		      rts
   1093  33e1
   1094  33e1							;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   1095  33e1
   1096  33e1		       00 00 00    ScoreCurrent ds	3, 0
   1097  33e4							; start cave and level have to be after ScoreCurrent!
   1098  33e4		       00	   StartCave  .byte.b	0
   1099  33e5		       00	   StartLevel .byte.b	0
   1100  33e6		       00 00 00    PlayerScores ds	3, 0
   1101  33e9							; cave and level have to be consecutive variables!
   1102  33e9		       00	   PlayerCave .byte.b	0
   1103  33ea		       00	   PlayerLevel .byte.b	0
   1104  33eb		       00 00 00 00*HighScore  ds	3+2, 0	; two extra bytes to save code
   1105  33f0
   1106  33f0
   1107  33f0
   1108  33f0							;------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   1109  33f0
      0  33f0					      CHECK_HALF_BANK_SIZE	"ROM_SHADOW_OF_BANK_SCORING"
      1  33f0
      2  33f0
      3  33f0		       03 f0	   .TEMP      =	* - BANK_START
 ROM_SHADOW_OF_BANK_SCORING (1K) SIZE =  $3f0 , FREE= $10
      4  33f0					      ECHO	"ROM_SHADOW_OF_BANK_SCORING", "(1K) SIZE = ", .TEMP, ", FREE=", ROM_BANK_SIZE/2 - .TEMP
      5  33f0				  -	      if	( .TEMP ) > ROM_BANK_SIZE/2
      6  33f0				  -	      ECHO	"HALF-BANK OVERFLOW @ ", * - ORIGIN
      7  33f0				  -	      ERR
      8  33f0					      endif
   1111  33f0
   1112  33f0							;------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   1113  33f0
   1114  33f0							; CAVE DATA banks can go anywhere - *EXCEPT* for the same bank as the cave
   1115  33f0							; decoder.  Ironic, isn't it?	They calculate a constant -- MAX_CAVE_SIZE
   1116  33f0							; which is used as a buffer size inside DecodeCave.  It's not important if
   1117  33f0							; this is defined before or after, as once the caves have processed it will be
   1118  33f0							; correct. Note, that caves should all be defined BEFORE *OR* AFTER the
   1119  33f0							; DecodeCave code -- but that they should not be both, nor in the same bank.
   1120  33f0
------- FILE CaveBank0.asm LEVEL 3 PASS 3
      0  33f0					      include	"CaveBank0.asm"
      1  33f0							; Cave definitions
      2  33f0							; Sample cave definitions.
      3  33f0							; Any cave can be in any bank.  System auto-calculates required bank buffer size in RAM.
      4  33f0							; have as many banks as you like.  Add new banks in notBOXDash.asm.
      5  33f0
      6  33f0
      7  33f0							;------------------------------------------------------------------------------
      8  33f0							;##############################################################################
      9  33f0							;------------------------------------------------------------------------------
     10  33f0
     11  33f0				  -	      IF	0	;{
     12  33f0				  -			;IF DEMO_VERSION = NO && FINAL_VERSION = NO
     13  33f0				  -	      START_CAVE	SELECTION_SCREEN
     14  33f0				  -
     15  33f0				  -
     16  33f0				  -	      .byte	0	; cave 0 -- selection screen
     17  33f0				  -	      CAVE_SIZE	10, SCREEN_LINES	; width, height
     18  33f0				  -	      .byte	$14	; Magic wall/amoeba slow growth for: 20 seconds
     19  33f0				  -	      .byte	$10	;BCD'd $0A			    ; Diamonds worth: 10 points
     20  33f0				  -	      .byte	$15	;BCD'd $0F			    ; Extra diamonds worth: 15 points
     21  33f0				  -	      CAVE_RANDOM	$0,0,0,0,0	; Randomiser seed values for difficulty levels 1-5
     22  33f0				  -	      .byte	$0C, $0C, $0C, $0C, $0C	; Diamonds needed: 12, 12, 12, 12, 12 (for difficulty levels 1-5)
     23  33f0				  -	      .byte	$FF,0,0,0,0	; cave time
     24  33f0				  -	      .byte	$a6, $96	; NTSC/PAL
     25  33f0				  -	      .byte	$36, $46	; NTSC/PAL
     26  33f0				  -	      .byte	$0e, $0e	; NTSC/PAL
     27  33f0				  -	      .byte	$00, $00, $00, $00	; Random objects:
     28  33f0				  -	      .byte	$00, $00, $00, $00	;   SPACE / BOXS/ DIAMONDS / unused
     29  33f0				  -
     30  33f0				  -
     31  33f0				  -			;.byte   FILL+CHARACTER_BOX, $01, $03, 38,6, $00
     32  33f0				  -	      STOCH	CHARACTER_MANOCCUPIED, $03, $04	; StoreChar zPRFd1 at ( 3, 4)
     33  33f0				  -	      STOCH	CHARACTER_EXPLOSION3, 1,3	; special selector creature (overload explosion character)
     34  33f0				  -	      END_CAVE	SELECTION_SCREEN
     35  33f0					      ENDIF		;}

    403  3552		       06 01 03 	      .byte.b	CHARACTER_MANOCCUPIED, $01, $03	; StoreChar zPRFd1 at ( 1, 3)
    404  3555		       11 26 16 	      .byte.b	CHARACTER_EXITDOOR, $26, $16	; StoreChar zPreOut at (38,22)
    405  3558		       81 08 0a 04*	      .byte.b	FILL+CHARACTER_SOIL, $08, $0A, $04, $04, CHARACTER_BLANK	; FilledRect of zDirt from ( 8,10); length = 4; height = 4; fill = zSpace
    406  355e		       07 0a 0b 	      .byte.b	CHARACTER_FLUTTERBY, $0A, $0B	; StoreChar zBFly1 at (10,11)
    407  3561		       81 10 0a 04*	      .byte.b	FILL+CHARACTER_SOIL, $10, $0A, $04, $04, CHARACTER_BLANK	; FilledRect of zDirt from (16,10); length = 4; height = 4; fill = zSpace
    408  3567		       07 12 0b 	      .byte.b	CHARACTER_FLUTTERBY, $12, $0B	; StoreChar zBFly1 at (18,11)
    409  356a		       81 18 0a 04*	      .byte.b	FILL+CHARACTER_SOIL, $18, $0A, $04, $04, CHARACTER_BLANK	; FilledRect of zDirt from (24,10); length = 4; height = 4; fill = zSpace
    410  3570		       07 1a 0b 	      .byte.b	CHARACTER_FLUTTERBY, $1A, $0B	; StoreChar zBFly1 at (26,11)
    411  3573		       81 20 0a 04*	      .byte.b	FILL+CHARACTER_SOIL, $20, $0A, $04, $04, CHARACTER_BLANK	; FilledRect of zDirt from (32,10); length = 4; height = 4; fill = zSpace
    412  3579		       07 22 0b 	      .byte.b	CHARACTER_FLUTTERBY, $22, $0B	; StoreChar zBFly1 at (34,11)
      0  357c					      END_CAVE	BUTTERFLIES
      1  357c		       ff		      .byte.b	$FF
      2  357c		       00 4e	   CAVE_SIZE_BUTTERFLIES =	* - CAVE_START
      3  357d				  -	      IF	CAVE_SIZE_BUTTERFLIES > MAX_CAVE_SIZE
      4  357d				  -MAX_CAVE_SIZE SET	CAVE_SIZE_BUTTERFLIES
      5  357d					      ENDIF
    414  357d					      ENDIF
    415  357d
    416  357d							; ECHO "MAX CAVE SIZE = ", MAX_CAVE_SIZE
------- FILE BANK_ROM_SHADOW_SCORING.asm
   1122  357d
      0  357d					      CHECK_BANK_SIZE	"ROM_SHADOW_OF_BANK_SCORING -- full 2K"
      1  357d		       05 7d	   .TEMP      =	* - BANK_START
 ROM_SHADOW_OF_BANK_SCORING -- full 2K (2K) SIZE =  $57d , FREE= $283
      2  357d					      ECHO	"ROM_SHADOW_OF_BANK_SCORING -- full 2K", "(2K) SIZE = ", .TEMP, ", FREE=", ROM_BANK_SIZE - .TEMP
      3  357d				  -	      if	( .TEMP ) > ROM_BANK_SIZE
      4  357d				  -	      ECHO	"BANK OVERFLOW @ ", * - ORIGIN
      5  357d				  -	      ERR
      6  357d					      endif
------- FILE ./sokoboo.asm
------- FILE BANK_GENERIC.asm LEVEL 2 PASS 3
      0  357d					      include	"BANK_GENERIC.asm"
      1  357d							;------------------------------------------------------------------------------
      2  357d							;##############################################################################
      3  357d							;------------------------------------------------------------------------------
      4  357d
      0  357d					      NEWBANK	GENERIC_BANK_1
      1  3f90 ????				      SEG	GENERIC_BANK_1
      2  3800					      ORG	ORIGIN
      3  3800					      RORG	$F000
      4  3800				   BANK_START SET	*
      5  3800				   GENERIC_BANK_1 SET	ORIGIN / 2048
      6  3800				   ORIGIN     SET	ORIGIN + 2048
      7  3800				   _CURRENT_BANK SET	GENERIC_BANK_1
      6  3800
      7  3800
      8  3800
      0  3800					      DEFINE_1K_SEGMENT	DECODE_CAVE_SHADOW
      1  3800					      ALIGN	$400
      2  3800				   SEGMENT_DECODE_CAVE_SHADOW SET	*
      3  3800				   BANK_DECODE_CAVE_SHADOW SET	_CURRENT_BANK
------- FILE DecodeCave.asm LEVEL 3 PASS 3
      0  3800					      include	"DecodeCave.asm"
      1  3800							;TODOs:
      2  3800							;+ load cave from ROM
      3  3800							;- remove delimiter
      4  3800							;+ variable board sizes
      5  3800							;- use Andrew's character ids
      6  3800							;+ store other cave parameter (times, diamonds, points etc.)
      7  3800
      8  3800							;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
      9  3800							; Board area must not overlap page boundary, as writing code uses indexing to save
     10  3800
      0  3800					      OPTIONAL_PAGEBREAK	"BOARD_DATA_AREA", MAX_CAVE_SIZE
     10  3800					      LIST	ON
     12  3800				   BOARD_DATA_AREA
     13  3800		       ff ff ff ff*	      ds	MAX_CAVE_SIZE,$FF
     14  38b9
     15  38b9							;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
     16  38b9
     17  38b9				   ThrottleSpeedTbl
     18  38b9							; based on MAX_THROTTLE = 160, NTSC_276/PAL (312/276=1.13)
     19  38b9		       13 16		      .byte.b	19, 22	; level 1 (E1: 5.60s) 1,16; 1.00/1.00 (1.00)
     20  38bb		       16 1a		      .byte.b	22, 26	; level 2 (E2	4.80s) 1,18  1.16/1.18 (1.17)
     21  38bd		       18 1c		      .byte.b	24, 28	; level 3 (E3: 4.40s) 1,16  1.26/1.27 (1.27)
     22  38bf		       1a 1e		      .byte.b	26, 30	; level 4 (E4: 4.17s) 1,15  1.37/1.36 (1.34)
     23  38c1		       1b 1f		      .byte.b	27, 31	; level 5 (E5: 4.00s) 1,14; 1.42/1.41 (1.40)
     24  38c3
      0  38c3					      DEFINE_SUBROUTINE	DecodeCave
      1  38c3		       00 07	   BANK_DecodeCave =	_CURRENT_BANK
      2  38c3					      SUBROUTINE
      3  38c3				   DecodeCave
     26  38c3
     27  38c3							; *** local constants for cava data: ***
     28  38c3
     29  38c3		       00 04	   .NUM_RANDOM =	4	; number of random objects
     30  38c3
     31  38c3		       00 01	   .SIZE_OFS  =	1	; -1
     32  38c3		       00 03	   .MAGIC_OFS =	3
     33  38c3		       00 04	   .WORTH_OFS =	4
     34  38c3		       00 05	   .EXTRA_WORTH_OFS =	5
     35  38c3		       00 0b	   .DIAMONDS_OFS =	11
     36  38c3		       00 10	   .TIME_OFS  =	16
     37  38c3		       00 06	   .RND_INIT_OFS =	$04+2	; -1
     38  38c3		       00 1b	   .RND_OBJECT_OFS =	$18+3	; -3
     39  38c3		       00 1f	   .RND_VALUE_OFS =	$1c+3	; -3
     40  38c3		       00 15	   .COLOR_OFS =	$13+2
     41  38c3
     42  38c3		       00 23	   .STRUCT_OFFSET =	$20+3	; -3
     43  38c3		       00 ff	   .STRUCT_DELIMITER =	$ff
     44  38c3		       00 c0	   .STRUCTURE_MASK =	%11000000
     45  38c3
     46  38c3		       00 00	   .STRUCT_SINGLE =	%00 << 6
     47  38c3							;.STRUCT_LINE	      = LINE
     48  38c3							;.STRUCT_FILLED      = FILL
     49  38c3							;.STRUCT_RECTANGLE   = RECT
     50  38c3		       00 40	   .STRUCT_LINE =	%01 << 6
     51  38c3		       00 80	   .STRUCT_FILLED =	%10 << 6
     52  38c3		       00 c0	   .STRUCT_RECTANGLE =	%11 << 6
     53  38c3							;POINT 	      = .STRUCT_POINT
     54  38c3		       00 80	   FILL       =	.STRUCT_FILLED
     55  38c3		       00 40	   LINE       =	.STRUCT_LINE
     56  38c3		       00 c0	   RECT       =	.STRUCT_RECTANGLE
     57  38c3
     58  38c3		       00 00	   .DIR_UP    =	0
     59  38c3		       00 02	   .DIR_RIGHT =	2
     60  38c3		       00 04	   .DIR_DOWN  =	4
     61  38c3		       00 06	   .DIR_LEFT  =	6
     62  38c3
     63  38c3
     64  38c3		       85 c4		      sta	RAM_Bank
     65  38c5
     66  38c5							; Setup for NTSC/PAL based on P1 difficulty (0=NTSC, 1=PAL)
     67  38c5							; Set the throttle speed based on system.
     68  38c5
      0  38c5					      DEFINE_SUBROUTINE	PlatformSelect
      1  38c5		       00 07	   BANK_PlatformSelect =	_CURRENT_BANK
      2  38c5					      SUBROUTINE
      3  38c5				   PlatformSelect
     70  38c5
     71  38c5							; has to be done before decoding the cave to have the platform right:
      0  38c5					      SET_PLATFORM
      1  38c5
      2  38c5
      3  38c5
      4  38c5
      5  38c5		       ad 82 02 	      lda	SWCHB
      6  38c8		       2a		      rol
      7  38c9		       2a		      rol
      8  38ca		       2a		      rol
      9  38cb		       29 03		      and	#%11
     10  38cd					      if	NTSC_MODE = NO
     11  38cd		       49 02		      eor	#PAL
     12  38cf					      endif
     13  38cf		       85 81		      sta	Platform
     73  38d1
     74  38d1
     75  38d1							;------------------------------------------------------------------------------
     76  38d1							; Copy the ROM cave data into our local RAM cave data buffer.	Note that the
     77  38d1							; system is automatically setup so that the biggest cave will cause the available
     78  38d1							; buffer to increase during compile time.  So all we really need to do here is
     79  38d1							; copy the appropriate amount of data for the cave from ROM elsewhere, and then
     80  38d1							; let the system run just as it was before.
     81  38d1
     82  38d1							; Note that cave is an index to 4-byte entry table, so please use CAVE_NAMED_*
     83  38d1							; for cave reference numbers.
     84  38d1
     85  38d1							;		  sta RAM_Bank
     86  38d1
     87  38d1		       a5 c9		      lda	NextLevelTrigger
     88  38d3		       09 80		      ora	#BIT_NEXTLEVEL
     89  38d5		       85 c9		      sta	NextLevelTrigger
     90  38d7
     91  38d7
     92  38d7
     93  38d7		       a9 07		      lda	#BANK_DecodeCave	; the *ROM* bank of this routine (NOT RAM)
     94  38d9		       85 c3		      sta	ROM_Bank	; GetROMByte returns to this bank
     95  38db
     96  38db		       a4 b0		      ldy	cave
     97  38dd		       b9 84 f3 	      lda	CaveInformation,y
     98  38e0		       85 bf		      sta	Board_AddressR
     99  38e2		       b9 85 f3 	      lda	CaveInformation+1,y
    100  38e5		       85 c0		      sta	Board_AddressR+1	; source of the board data (bank handled later)
    101  38e7
    102  38e7		       b9 87 f3 	      lda	CaveInformation+3,y	; size of the board data in bytes
    103  38ea		       8d 15 f5 	      sta	SMLimit+RAM_WRITE+1	; might as well use self-modifying
    104  38ed
    105  38ed		       b9 88 f3 	      lda	CaveInformation+4,y
    106  38f0		       85 b2		      sta	caveDisplay	; what to display as the cave ID.
    107  38f2
    108  38f2		       a2 00		      ldx	#0
    109  38f4		       86 bb		      stx	caveTimeFrac	; now the 1st second is fully available
    110  38f6		       86 cc		      stx	amoebaFlag
    111  38f8		       86 df	   CopyBoardData stx	savex
    112  38fa
    113  38fa							; We are using GetROMByte to get *any* byte from ROM (although it was designed
    114  38fa							; just to get a board-character).  Should be OK.
    115  38fa
    116  38fa		       a4 b0		      ldy	cave
    117  38fc		       b9 86 f3 	      lda	CaveInformation+2,y	; bank of the board data
    118  38ff		       a0 00		      ldy	#0
    119  3901		       20 61 f8 	      jsr	GetROMByte	; note, this returns to ROM -- but that's a copy of us!!
    120  3904		       a4 c4		      ldy	RAM_Bank	; RAM bank we are *actually* running from
    121  3906		       84 3e		      sty	SET_BANK_RAM	; and switch 'ourself' back in.  Sneaky.
    122  3908
    123  3908		       a6 df		      ldx	savex
    124  390a		       9d 00 f4 	      sta	BOARD_DATA_AREA + RAM_WRITE,x	; save byte from ROM into our local RAM buffer
    125  390d
    126  390d		       e6 bf		      inc	Board_AddressR
    127  390f		       d0 02		      bne	NoPage
    128  3911		       e6 c0		      inc	Board_AddressR+1	; point to next byte of data
    129  3913				   NoPage
    130  3913
    131  3913		       e8		      inx
    132  3914		       e0 00	   SMLimit    cpx	#0	; byte count (self) modified by board size
    133  3916		       d0 e0		      bne	CopyBoardData
    134  3918
    135  3918
    136  3918							;------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    137  3918
    138  3918
    139  3918		       a9 00		      lda	#<BOARD_DATA_AREA
    140  391a		       85 df		      sta	ptrCave
    141  391c		       a9 f0		      lda	#>BOARD_DATA_AREA
    142  391e		       85 e0		      sta	ptrCave+1
    143  3920
    144  3920							; colors are organised in 3 NTSC/PAL pairs (medium mixcolor, dark color, bright mixcolor)
    145  3920		       a5 81		      lda	Platform
    146  3922		       c9 02		      cmp	#PAL
    147  3924		       a0 1a		      ldy	#.COLOR_OFS+5
    148  3926		       b0 01		      bcs	.originalPlatform
    149  3928		       88		      dey
    150  3929				   .originalPlatform
    151  3929		       a2 02		      ldx	#3-1
    152  392b				   .copyCols
    153  392b		       b1 df		      lda	(ptrCave),y
    154  392d		       95 bc		      sta	color,x
    155  392f		       88		      dey
    156  3930		       88		      dey
    157  3931		       ca		      dex
    158  3932		       10 f7		      bpl	.copyCols
    159  3934
    160  3934		       a0 01		      ldy	#.SIZE_OFS
    161  3936		       b1 df		      lda	(ptrCave),y
    162  3938		       85 98		      sta	BoardLimit_Width
    163  393a		       8d f9 f7 	      sta	BoundingWall+RAM_WRITE+3
    164  393d		       c8		      iny
    165  393e		       b1 df		      lda	(ptrCave),y
    166  3940		       85 99		      sta	BoardLimit_Height
    167  3942		       8d fa f7 	      sta	BoundingWall+RAM_WRITE+4
    168  3945
    169  3945							;*** 1. load some cave data ***
    170  3945		       c8		      iny		;	     Y == 3 == .MAGIC_OFS
    171  3946		       b1 df		      lda	(ptrCave),y
    172  3948		       85 b5		      sta	magicAmoebaTime
    173  394a
    174  394a		       c8		      iny		;	     Y == 4 == .WORTH_OFS
    175  394b		       b1 df		      lda	(ptrCave),y
    176  394d							;jsr	  Convert2BCD
    177  394d		       85 b7		      sta	diamondsWorth	; now BCD in cave data
    178  394f
    179  394f		       a0 05		      ldy	#.EXTRA_WORTH_OFS
    180  3951		       b1 df		      lda	(ptrCave),y
    181  3953							;jsr	  Convert2BCD
    182  3953		       85 b8		      sta	diamondsExtraWorth	; now BCD in cave data
    183  3955
    184  3955		       a9 10		      lda	#.TIME_OFS
    185  3957		       20 7a f2 	      jsr	GetLevelDataBCD
    186  395a		       85 b9		      sta	caveTime
    187  395c		       86 ba		      stx	caveTimeHi
    188  395e
    189  395e		       a9 0b		      lda	#.DIAMONDS_OFS
    190  3960		       20 7a f2 	      jsr	GetLevelDataBCD
    191  3963		       85 b6		      sta	diamondsNeeded	;	 should never be 0
    192  3965
    193  3965							; *** 2. create random objects ***
    194  3965							; set initial random seed for level:
    195  3965		       a9 00		      lda	#0
    196  3967		       85 e3		      sta	randSeed1
    197  3969		       a9 06		      lda	#.RND_INIT_OFS
    198  396b		       20 9e f2 	      jsr	GetLevelData
    199  396e		       85 e4		      sta	randSeed2
    200  3970
    201  3970							; setup pointers:
    202  3970		       a9 1f		      lda	#.RND_VALUE_OFS
    203  3972		       a2 02		      ldx	#2
    204  3974		       20 a7 f2 	      jsr	AddPointer	;	 set ptrCave+2 to random values
    205  3977		       a9 1b		      lda	#.RND_OBJECT_OFS
    206  3979		       20 a5 f2 	      jsr	AddPointer0	;	 set ptrCave+0 to random objects
    207  397c
    208  397c							; loop the board:
    209  397c		       a0 01		      ldy	#1
    210  397e				   .loopRows
    211  397e		       84 90		      sty	POS_Y
    212  3980		       a2 00		      ldx	#0
    213  3982				   .loopColumns
    214  3982		       86 8f		      stx	POS_X
    215  3984							; get random object type:
    216  3984		       20 b3 f2 	      jsr	NextRandom	;	 a = randSeed1
    217  3987		       a0 03		      ldy	#.NUM_RANDOM-1
    218  3989				   .loopRandom
    219  3989		       d1 e1		      cmp	(ptrCave+2),y
    220  398b		       90 06		      bcc	.exitRandom
    221  398d		       88		      dey
    222  398e		       10 f9		      bpl	.loopRandom
    223  3990		       a9 00		      lda	#CHARACTER_BLANK	;	 default character (dirt), = 0
      0  3992					      NOP_W
      1  3992		       0c		      .byte.b	$0c
    225  3993				   .exitRandom
    226  3993		       a9 00		      lda	#CHARACTER_BLANK	;	 default character (dirt), = 0
    227  3995							;		  lda	  (ptrCave),y
    228  3995		       85 93		      sta	POS_Type
    229  3997
    230  3997							; put new object on board:
    231  3997		       20 93 f8 	      jsr	PutBoardCharacterFromRAM
    232  399a							; goto next board cell:
    233  399a		       a6 8f		      ldx	POS_X
    234  399c		       e8		      inx
    235  399d		       e4 98		      cpx	BoardLimit_Width
    236  399f		       90 e1		      bcc	.loopColumns
    237  39a1		       a4 90		      ldy	POS_Y
    238  39a3		       c8		      iny
    239  39a4		       c4 99		      cpy	BoardLimit_Height
    240  39a6		       90 d6		      bcc	.loopRows
    241  39a8
    242  39a8							; *** 3. draw the bounding steel wall: ***
    243  39a8		       a9 f6		      lda	#<(BoundingWall)
    244  39aa		       85 df		      sta	ptrCave
    245  39ac		       a9 f3		      lda	#>(BoundingWall)
    246  39ae		       85 e0		      sta	ptrCave+1
    247  39b0		       20 d7 f2 	      jsr	DecodeBoundary
    248  39b3
    249  39b3							; ...and decode the structures...
    250  39b3		       a9 00		      lda	#<(BOARD_DATA_AREA)
    251  39b5		       85 df		      sta	ptrCave
    252  39b7		       a9 f0		      lda	#>(BOARD_DATA_AREA)
    253  39b9		       85 e0		      sta	ptrCave+1
    254  39bb		       20 d2 f2 	      jsr	DecodeStructures
    255  39be
    256  39be							;*** 4. activate all objects: ***
    257  39be
    258  39be				   ActivateObjects
    259  39be
    260  39be		       a4 99		      ldy	BoardLimit_Height
    261  39c0				   .loopY
    262  39c0		       88		      dey
    263  39c1		       84 90		      sty	POS_Y
    264  39c3		       a6 98		      ldx	BoardLimit_Width
    265  39c5				   .loopX
    266  39c5		       ca		      dex
    267  39c6		       86 8f		      stx	POS_X
    268  39c8		       20 7f f8 	      jsr	GetBoardCharacter__CALL_FROM_RAM__	;6+61(A)
    269  39cb		       aa		      tax
    270  39cc		       bd 51 f2 	      lda	CharToType2,x
    271  39cf		       30 64		      bmi	.skipActivate
    272  39d1
    273  39d1		       c9 40		      cmp	#SPECIAL_ADD
    274  39d3		       29 1f		      and	#TYPEMASK
    275  39d5		       85 93		      sta	POS_Type	;	 creature TYPE
    276  39d7		       90 23		      bcc	.Activate
    277  39d9
    278  39d9					      IF	SPECIAL_ADD_DECODECAVE = YES
    279  39d9
    280  39d9							;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    281  39d9							; 23/June/2011: Some objects (BOXs, diamonds) of type SPECIAL_ADD only go onto the creature stack IF they
    282  39d9							; have a surrounding blank square which means they MAY fall on startup.  So, we need to see if the LRD squares
    283  39d9							; (any) are blank. They may not ACTUALLY fall, but that will be checked in due course as they're on the stack.
    284  39d9
    285  39d9							;  +---+---+---+
    286  39d9							;  | 1 | X | 2 |
    287  39d9							;  +---+---+---+
    288  39d9							;	| 0 |
    289  39d9							;	+---+
    290  39d9
    291  39d9
    292  39d9		       e6 90		      inc	POS_Y
    293  39db		       20 7f f8 	      jsr	GetBoardCharacter__CALL_FROM_RAM__	;6+61(A)[0]
    294  39de		       c6 90		      dec	POS_Y
    295  39e0		       c9 00		      cmp	#0
    296  39e2		       f0 16		      beq	ItIsBlank
    297  39e4
    298  39e4		       c6 8f		      dec	POS_X
    299  39e6		       20 7f f8 	      jsr	GetBoardCharacter__CALL_FROM_RAM__	;6+61(A)[1]
    300  39e9		       e6 8f		      inc	POS_X
    301  39eb		       c9 00		      cmp	#0
    302  39ed		       f0 0b		      beq	ItIsBlank
    303  39ef
    304  39ef		       e6 8f		      inc	POS_X
    305  39f1		       20 7f f8 	      jsr	GetBoardCharacter__CALL_FROM_RAM__	;6+61(A)[2]
    306  39f4		       c6 8f		      dec	POS_X
    307  39f6		       c9 00		      cmp	#0
    308  39f8		       d0 3b		      bne	.skipActivate
    309  39fa
    310  39fa		       a5 93	   ItIsBlank  lda	POS_Type
    311  39fc
    312  39fc				  -	      ELSE
    313  39fc				  -	      jmp	.skipActivate
    314  39fc					      ENDIF
    315  39fc
    316  39fc							;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    317  39fc
    318  39fc				   .Activate
    319  39fc		       a8		      tay
    320  39fd		       b9 69 f2 	      lda	InitialFace,y
    321  3a00		       85 94		      sta	POS_VAR
    322  3a02
    323  3a02		       bd 51 f2 	      lda	CharToType2,x
    324  3a05		       29 20		      and	#ALTERNATE_FACE
    325  3a07		       f0 04		      beq	noAlternate
    326  3a09
    327  3a09		       e6 94		      inc	POS_VAR
    328  3a0b		       e6 94		      inc	POS_VAR
    329  3a0d
    330  3a0d		       98	   noAlternate tya
    331  3a0e		       aa		      tax
    332  3a0f		       e0 02		      cpx	#TYPE_AMOEBA
    333  3a11		       f0 03		      beq	skipAmoebaSpecial
    334  3a13
    335  3a13		       20 03 fa 	      jsr	InsertObjectStackFromRAM	;6+94(B)
    336  3a16
    337  3a16				   skipAmoebaSpecial
    338  3a16							;tes
    339  3a16
    340  3a16							; handle special types:
    341  3a16		       a6 8f		      ldx	POS_X	;	 x coordinate
    342  3a18		       a4 90		      ldy	POS_Y	;	 y coordinate
    343  3a1a		       a5 93		      lda	POS_Type
    344  3a1c		       c9 02		      cmp	#TYPE_AMOEBA
    345  3a1e		       d0 0d		      bne	.skipAmoeba
    346  3a20
    347  3a20		       a9 40		      lda	#AMOEBA_PRESENT
    348  3a22		       85 cc		      sta	amoebaFlag	; this turns ON the scanning for this level
    349  3a24							; Remember initial Amoeba position for bounding box.
    350  3a24							; Since always the left most cell is added last and there are no more than two cells in same row at the beginning,
    351  3a24							; simply increasing the maximum X by 1 solves the problem
    352  3a24		       86 ce		      stx	amoebaMinX
    353  3a26		       e8		      inx
    354  3a27		       86 d0		      stx	amoebaMaxX
    355  3a29		       84 cf		      sty	amoebaMinY
    356  3a2b		       84 d1		      sty	amoebaMaxY
    357  3a2d
    358  3a2d				   .skipAmoeba
    359  3a2d		       c9 00		      cmp	#TYPE_MAN
    360  3a2f		       d0 04		      bne	.skipActivate
    361  3a31
    362  3a31							; insert man:
    363  3a31		       86 9f		      stx	ManX
    364  3a33		       84 a0		      sty	ManY
    365  3a35
    366  3a35		       a6 8f	   .skipActivate ldx	POS_X	;	 x coordinate
    367  3a37		       d0 8c		      bne	.loopX
    368  3a39		       a4 90		      ldy	POS_Y	;	 y coordinate
    369  3a3b		       d0 83		      bne	.loopY
    370  3a3d
    371  3a3d
    372  3a3d							; adjusts playing speed based on level:
    373  3a3d
    374  3a3d		       a9 04		      lda	#NUM_LEVELS-1	; intermissions run at full speed
    375  3a3f		       24 b2		      bit	caveDisplay
    376  3a41		       30 02		      bmi	.intermission3
    377  3a43		       a5 b1		      lda	level
    378  3a45				   .intermission3
    379  3a45		       0a		      asl
    380  3a46		       0a		      asl
    381  3a47		       05 81		      ora	Platform
    382  3a49		       4a		      lsr
    383  3a4a		       aa		      tax
    384  3a4b		       bd b9 f0 	      lda	ThrottleSpeedTbl,x
    385  3a4e		       85 b4		      sta	ThrottleSpeed
    386  3a50

    398  3a51
    399  3a51
    400  3a51				   CharToType2
    401  3a51
    402  3a51							; Converts a character # to a creature type
    403  3a51							; add 128 if character is NOT to be added as a creature on board draw
    404  3a51
    405  3a51		       ff		      .byte.b	NULL_TYPE	; blank
    406  3a52		       ff		      .byte.b	NULL_TYPE	; soil
    407  3a53		       41		      .byte.b	TYPE_BOX + SPECIAL_ADD
    408  3a54		       02		      .byte.b	TYPE_AMOEBA
    409  3a55		       45		      .byte.b	TYPE_DIAMOND + SPECIAL_ADD
    410  3a56		       45		      .byte.b	TYPE_DIAMOND + SPECIAL_ADD
    411  3a57		       00		      .byte.b	TYPE_MAN
    412  3a58		       03		      .byte.b	TYPE_FLUTTERBY
    413  3a59		       23		      .byte.b	TYPE_FLUTTERBY + ALTERNATE_FACE	; character_flutterby2
    414  3a5a		       04		      .byte.b	TYPE_FIREFLY
    415  3a5b		       24		      .byte.b	TYPE_FIREFLY + ALTERNATE_FACE	; character_firefly2
    416  3a5c		       86		      .byte.b	TYPE_MAGICWALL + NOT_ADDED
    417  3a5d		       86		      .byte.b	TYPE_MAGICWALL + NOT_ADDED
    418  3a5e		       86		      .byte.b	TYPE_MAGICWALL + NOT_ADDED
    419  3a5f		       86		      .byte.b	TYPE_MAGICWALL + NOT_ADDED
    420  3a60		       ff		      .byte.b	NULL_TYPE	; steel wall
    421  3a61		       ff		      .byte.b	NULL_TYPE	; plain brick wall
    422  3a62		       87		      .byte.b	TYPE_EXITDOOR + NOT_ADDED
    423  3a63		       87		      .byte.b	TYPE_EXITDOOR + NOT_ADDED
    424  3a64		       09		      .byte.b	TYPE_EXPLOSION
    425  3a65		       0a		      .byte.b	TYPE_EXPLOSION1
    426  3a66		       0b		      .byte.b	TYPE_EXPLOSION2
    427  3a67		       08		      .byte.b	TYPE_SELECTOR	;EXPLOSION3		     ; overload explosion character
    428  3a68		       02		      .byte.b	TYPE_AMOEBA
    429  3a69
    430  3a69							; The following two will NEVER APPEAR ON BOARD DECODE DATA so can be skipped
    431  3a69							;.byte TYPE_BOX			      ; falling BOX
    432  3a69							;.byte TYPE_DIAMOND
    433  3a69							;.byte TYPE_MAN				 ; unkillable man
    434  3a69
    435  3a69							; --> see also MoveVec
    436  3a69							; --> see also DecodeCave's table
    437  3a69
      0  3a69					      DEFINE_SUBROUTINE	InitialFace	;[type]
      1  3a69		       00 07	   BANK_InitialFace =	_CURRENT_BANK
      2  3a69					      SUBROUTINE
      3  3a69				   InitialFace
    439  3a69
    440  3a69							; Given an object type, gives an initial facing direction for that type.
    441  3a69							; If changing, also see 'DEFINE' definitions of types in BANK_INITBANK.asm
    442  3a69
    443  3a69		       00		      .byte.b	0	; MAN
    444  3a6a		       00		      .byte.b	0	; BOX
    445  3a6b		       00		      .byte.b	0	; AMOEBA
    446  3a6c		       02		      .byte.b	FACE_DOWN	; FLUTTERBY	 starts life facing down
    447  3a6d		       0b		      .byte.b	FACE_LEFT+8	; FIREFLY	 starts life facing left
    448  3a6e		       00		      .byte.b	0	; DIAMOND
    449  3a6f		       01		      .byte.b	1	; WALL0						 facing????
    450  3a70		       00		      .byte.b	0	; EXITDOOR
    451  3a71		       00		      .byte.b	0	; SELECT
    452  3a72		       00		      .byte.b	0	; EXPLOSION
    453  3a73		       00		      .byte.b	0	; EXPLOSION1
    454  3a74		       00		      .byte.b	0	; EXPLOSION2
    455  3a75		       00		      .byte.b	0	; EXPLOSION3
    456  3a76		       00		      .byte.b	0	; BLANK
    457  3a77		       00		      .byte.b	0	; SOIL
    458  3a78		       00		      .byte.b	0	; STEEL
    459  3a79		       00		      .byte.b	0	; WALL
    460  3a7a
    461  3a7a
    462  3a7a				   GetLevelDataBCD		; SUBROUTINE
    463  3a7a		       20 9e f2 	      jsr	GetLevelData
    464  3a7d
    465  3a7d				   Convert2BCD		; SUBROUTINE
    466  3a7d		       a2 00		      ldx	#0
    467  3a7f		       a0 ff		      ldy	#<(-1)
    468  3a81				   .loop
    469  3a81		       c8		      iny
    470  3a82		       c0 0a		      cpy	#10
    471  3a84		       90 03		      bcc	.ok
    472  3a86		       a0 00		      ldy	#0
    473  3a88		       e8		      inx
    474  3a89				   .ok
    475  3a89		       38		      sec
    476  3a8a		       e9 0a		      sbc	#10
    477  3a8c		       b0 f3		      bcs	.loop
    478  3a8e		       69 0a		      adc	#10
    479  3a90		       19 94 f2 	      ora	Mult16Tbl,y
    480  3a93		       60		      rts
    481  3a94
    482  3a94				   Y	      SET	0
    483  3a94				   Mult16Tbl
    484  3a94					      REPEAT	10
    485  3a94		       00		      .byte.b	Y
    486  3a94				   Y	      SET	Y + $10
    484  3a94					      REPEND
    485  3a95		       10		      .byte.b	Y
    486  3a95				   Y	      SET	Y + $10
    484  3a95					      REPEND
    485  3a96		       20		      .byte.b	Y
    486  3a96				   Y	      SET	Y + $10
    484  3a96					      REPEND
    485  3a97		       30		      .byte.b	Y
    486  3a97				   Y	      SET	Y + $10
    484  3a97					      REPEND
    485  3a98		       40		      .byte.b	Y
    486  3a98				   Y	      SET	Y + $10
    484  3a98					      REPEND
    485  3a99		       50		      .byte.b	Y
    486  3a99				   Y	      SET	Y + $10
    484  3a99					      REPEND
    485  3a9a		       60		      .byte.b	Y
    486  3a9a				   Y	      SET	Y + $10
    484  3a9a					      REPEND
    485  3a9b		       70		      .byte.b	Y
    486  3a9b				   Y	      SET	Y + $10
    484  3a9b					      REPEND
    485  3a9c		       80		      .byte.b	Y
    486  3a9c				   Y	      SET	Y + $10
    484  3a9c					      REPEND
    485  3a9d		       90		      .byte.b	Y
    486  3a9d				   Y	      SET	Y + $10
    487  3a9e					      REPEND
    488  3a9e
    489  3a9e				   GetLevelData 		; SUBROUTINE
    490  3a9e		       18		      clc
    491  3a9f		       65 b1		      adc	level
    492  3aa1		       a8		      tay
    493  3aa2		       b1 df		      lda	(ptrCave),y
    494  3aa4		       60		      rts
    495  3aa5
    496  3aa5				   AddPointer0
    497  3aa5		       a2 00		      ldx	#0
    498  3aa7				   AddPointer
    499  3aa7		       18		      clc
    500  3aa8		       65 df		      adc	ptrCave
    501  3aaa		       95 df		      sta	ptrCave,x
    502  3aac		       a5 e0		      lda	ptrCave+1
    503  3aae		       69 00		      adc	#0
    504  3ab0		       95 e0		      sta	ptrCave+1,x
    505  3ab2		       60		      rts
    506  3ab3
    507  3ab3
    508  3ab3				   NextRandom
    509  3ab3		       a5 e3		      lda	randSeed1
    510  3ab5		       6a		      ror
    511  3ab6		       6a		      ror
    512  3ab7		       29 80		      and	#$80
    513  3ab9		       85 e5		      sta	tempRand1	;	 TempRand1 = (RandSeed1 & 1) << 7
    514  3abb
    515  3abb		       a5 e4		      lda	randSeed2
    516  3abd		       4a		      lsr
    517  3abe		       85 e6		      sta	tempRand2	;	 TempRand2 = RandSeed2 >> 1
    518  3ac0
    519  3ac0							;		  lda	  randSeed2
    520  3ac0							;		  and	  #$01
    521  3ac0							;		  lsr
    522  3ac0		       a9 00		      lda	#$00
    523  3ac2		       6a		      ror
    524  3ac3		       65 e4		      adc	randSeed2	;	 C=0!
    525  3ac5		       69 13		      adc	#$13	;	 C=?
    526  3ac7		       85 e4		      sta	randSeed2	;	 RandSeed2 = RandSeed2 << 7 + RandSeed2 + $13
    527  3ac9
    528  3ac9		       a5 e3		      lda	randSeed1
    529  3acb		       65 e5		      adc	tempRand1	;	 C=?
    530  3acd		       65 e6		      adc	tempRand2	;	 C=?
    531  3acf		       85 e3		      sta	randSeed1
    532  3ad1				   Exit
    533  3ad1		       60		      rts
    534  3ad2
    535  3ad2
    536  3ad2				   DecodeStructures
    537  3ad2		       a9 23		      lda	#.STRUCT_OFFSET
    538  3ad4				   .loopStructures
    539  3ad4		       20 a5 f2 	      jsr	AddPointer0
    540  3ad7				   DecodeBoundary
    541  3ad7							; load structure type and object:
    542  3ad7		       a0 00		      ldy	#0
    543  3ad9		       b1 df		      lda	(ptrCave),y
    544  3adb		       c9 ff		      cmp	#.STRUCT_DELIMITER
    545  3add		       f0 f2		      beq	Exit
    546  3adf		       29 3f		      and	#(~.STRUCTURE_MASK) & $FF
    547  3ae1		       85 93		      sta	POS_Type
    548  3ae3		       51 df		      eor	(ptrCave),y
    549  3ae5		       0a		      asl
    550  3ae6		       2a		      rol
    551  3ae7		       2a		      rol
    552  3ae8		       85 e3		      sta	structType
    553  3aea							; load structure values:
    554  3aea		       a0 01		      ldy	#1
    555  3aec		       b1 df		      lda	(ptrCave),y	;	 +1
    556  3aee		       85 e4		      sta	column
    557  3af0		       c8		      iny
    558  3af1		       b1 df		      lda	(ptrCave),y	;	 +2
    559  3af3		       38		      sec
    560  3af4		       e9 02		      sbc	#2	;	 cave starts at row 2 in C64 original
    561  3af6		       85 e5		      sta	row
    562  3af8		       c8		      iny
    563  3af9		       b1 df		      lda	(ptrCave),y	;	 +3
    564  3afb		       85 e6		      sta	length
    565  3afd		       c8		      iny
    566  3afe		       b1 df		      lda	(ptrCave),y	;	 +4
    567  3b00		       85 e1		      sta	height	;	 == direction for LINE
    568  3b02
    569  3b02							; process structure:
    570  3b02		       a6 e3		      ldx	structType
    571  3b04		       d0 12		      bne	.skipSingle
    572  3b06							; draw single object:
    573  3b06		       a6 e4		      ldx	column
    574  3b08		       86 8f		      stx	POS_X
    575  3b0a		       a5 e5		      lda	row
    576  3b0c		       85 90		      sta	POS_Y
    577  3b0e		       20 93 f8 	      jsr	PutBoardCharacterFromRAM
    578  3b11
    579  3b11				   .nextStructure
    580  3b11		       a6 e3		      ldx	structType
    581  3b13		       bd f2 f3 	      lda	StructureSizeTbl,x
    582  3b16		       d0 bc		      bne	.loopStructures	; 3	 unconditional
    583  3b18							;    DEBUG_BRK
    584  3b18
    585  3b18				   .skipSingle
    586  3b18		       ca		      dex
    587  3b19		       d0 05		      bne	.skipLine
    588  3b1b							; draw a line:
    589  3b1b		       20 44 f3 	      jsr	DrawLine	;	 a == direction
    590  3b1e		       f0 f1		      beq	.nextStructure	; 3	 unconditional
    591  3b20							;    DEBUG_BRK
    592  3b20
    593  3b20				   .skipLine
    594  3b20		       ca		      dex
    595  3b21		       d0 1a		      bne	.skipFilled
    596  3b23							; draw a filled rectangle:
    597  3b23		       20 6f f3 	      jsr	DrawRectangle
    598  3b26
    599  3b26		       a0 05		      ldy	#5
    600  3b28		       b1 df		      lda	(ptrCave),y	;	 +5
    601  3b2a		       85 93		      sta	POS_Type
    602  3b2c
    603  3b2c		       e6 e4		      inc	column
    604  3b2e		       c6 e1		      dec	height
    605  3b30		       c6 e6		      dec	length
    606  3b32				   .loopFill
    607  3b32		       e6 e5		      inc	row
    608  3b34		       20 42 f3 	      jsr	DrawLineRight
    609  3b37		       c6 e1		      dec	height
    610  3b39		       d0 f7		      bne	.loopFill
    611  3b3b		       f0 d4		      beq	.nextStructure	; 3	 unconditional
    612  3b3d
    613  3b3d				   .skipFilled
    614  3b3d							; draw a rectangle:
    615  3b3d		       20 6f f3 	      jsr	DrawRectangle
    616  3b40		       f0 cf		      beq	.nextStructure	; 3	 unconditional
    617  3b42							;    DEBUG_BRK
    618  3b42
    619  3b42				   DrawLineRight
    620  3b42		       a9 02		      lda	#.DIR_RIGHT
    621  3b44				   DrawLine
    622  3b44		       a6 e4		      ldx	column
    623  3b46		       a4 e5		      ldy	row
    624  3b48							; direction is set outside
    625  3b48		       86 8f		      stx	POS_X
    626  3b4a		       84 90		      sty	POS_Y
    627  3b4c				   DrawNextHLine
    628  3b4c		       a6 e6		      ldx	length
      0  3b4e					      NOP_W
      1  3b4e		       0c		      .byte.b	$0c
    630  3b4f				   DrawNextVLine
    631  3b4f		       a6 e1		      ldx	height
    632  3b51		       85 e2		      sta	direction
    633  3b53		       86 e9		      stx	tmpLength
    634  3b55				   .loopLine
    635  3b55		       20 93 f8 	      jsr	PutBoardCharacterFromRAM
    636  3b58		       a4 e2		      ldy	direction
    637  3b5a		       a5 8f		      lda	POS_X
    638  3b5c		       18		      clc
    639  3b5d		       79 ea f3 	      adc	ColumnDirTbl,y
    640  3b60		       85 8f		      sta	POS_X
    641  3b62		       a5 90		      lda	POS_Y
    642  3b64		       18		      clc
    643  3b65		       79 e8 f3 	      adc	RowDirTbl,y
    644  3b68		       85 90		      sta	POS_Y
    645  3b6a		       c6 e9		      dec	tmpLength
    646  3b6c		       d0 e7		      bne	.loopLine
    647  3b6e		       60		      rts
    648  3b6f
    649  3b6f
    650  3b6f				   DrawRectangle
    651  3b6f		       c6 e6		      dec	length
    652  3b71		       c6 e1		      dec	height
    653  3b73
    654  3b73		       20 42 f3 	      jsr	DrawLineRight
    655  3b76
    656  3b76		       a9 04		      lda	#.DIR_DOWN
    657  3b78		       20 4f f3 	      jsr	DrawNextVLine
    658  3b7b		       a9 06		      lda	#.DIR_LEFT
    659  3b7d		       20 4c f3 	      jsr	DrawNextHLine
    660  3b80		       a9 00		      lda	#.DIR_UP
    661  3b82		       10 cb		      bpl	DrawNextVLine	; 3	 unconditional
    662  3b84							;    DEBUG_BRK
    663  3b84
    664  3b84
    665  3b84				   CAVENUM    SET	0
    666  3b84		       00 05	   CAVE_DATA_SIZE =	5
    667  3b84
    668  3b84					      MAC	add_cave
    669  3b84				   CAVE_ACTIVE_{1} SET	1
    670  3b84				   CAVE_NAMED_{1} =	CAVENUM
    671  3b84					      .byte	<CAVE_{1}
    672  3b84					      .byte	>CAVE_{1}
    673  3b84					      .byte	BANK_CAVE_{1}
    674  3b84					      .byte	CAVE_SIZE_{1}
    675  3b84					      .byte	{2}	; display as #.  $80 indicates intermission.
    676  3b84				   CAVENUM    SET	CAVENUM + CAVE_DATA_SIZE
    677  3b84					      ENDM		; {name}
    678  3b84
    679  3b84				   CaveInformation
    680  3b84
    681  3b84							; The ordering here corresponds to the ordering when playing...
    682  3b84					      IF	FINAL_VERSION = YES || DEMO_VERSION = NO
      0  3b84					      ADD_CAVE	INTRO,1
      1  3b84				   CAVE_ACTIVE_INTRO SET	1
      2  3b84		       00 00	   CAVE_NAMED_INTRO =	CAVENUM
      3  3b84		       f0		      .byte.b	<CAVE_INTRO
      4  3b85		       f3		      .byte.b	>CAVE_INTRO
      5  3b86		       06		      .byte.b	BANK_CAVE_INTRO
      6  3b87		       b9		      .byte.b	CAVE_SIZE_INTRO
      7  3b88		       01		      .byte.b	1
      8  3b88				   CAVENUM    SET	CAVENUM + CAVE_DATA_SIZE
      0  3b89					      ADD_CAVE	ROOMS,2
      1  3b89				   CAVE_ACTIVE_ROOMS SET	1
      2  3b89		       00 05	   CAVE_NAMED_ROOMS =	CAVENUM
      3  3b89		       a9		      .byte.b	<CAVE_ROOMS
      4  3b8a		       f4		      .byte.b	>CAVE_ROOMS
      5  3b8b		       06		      .byte.b	BANK_CAVE_ROOMS
      6  3b8c		       5c		      .byte.b	CAVE_SIZE_ROOMS
      7  3b8d		       02		      .byte.b	2
      8  3b8d				   CAVENUM    SET	CAVENUM + CAVE_DATA_SIZE
      0  3b8e					      ADD_CAVE	MAZE,3
      1  3b8e				   CAVE_ACTIVE_MAZE SET	1
      2  3b8e		       00 0a	   CAVE_NAMED_MAZE =	CAVENUM
      3  3b8e		       05		      .byte.b	<CAVE_MAZE
      4  3b8f		       f5		      .byte.b	>CAVE_MAZE
      5  3b90		       06		      .byte.b	BANK_CAVE_MAZE
      6  3b91		       2a		      .byte.b	CAVE_SIZE_MAZE
      7  3b92		       03		      .byte.b	3
      8  3b92				   CAVENUM    SET	CAVENUM + CAVE_DATA_SIZE
      0  3b93					      ADD_CAVE	BUTTERFLIES,4
      1  3b93				   CAVE_ACTIVE_BUTTERFLIES SET	1
      2  3b93		       00 0f	   CAVE_NAMED_BUTTERFLIES =	CAVENUM
      3  3b93		       2f		      .byte.b	<CAVE_BUTTERFLIES

      6  3b96		       4e		      .byte.b	CAVE_SIZE_BUTTERFLIES
      7  3b97		       04		      .byte.b	4
      8  3b97				   CAVENUM    SET	CAVENUM + CAVE_DATA_SIZE

    733  3bf6							;07	 bf cd 7a		 fb fb 8b    yellow
    734  3bf6							;08	 7b 5b 2f    90 5f 35	 d8 9c 5b    orange
    735  3bf6							;09	 4f 45 00    92 71 00	 7f 53 07    brown
    736  3bf6							;0a	 a3 72 65    bb 77 6d	 ef 83 9f    light-red
    737  3bf6							;0b	 50 50 50    55 55 55	 57 57 53    dark-gray
    738  3bf6							;0c	 78 78 78		 a3 a7 a7    gray

    744  3bf6							; structure for the bounding steel wall:
    745  3bf6				   BoundingWall
    746  3bf6		       cf 00 02 63*	      .byte.b	.STRUCT_RECTANGLE|CHARACTER_STEEL, 0, 2, 99, 99	; bounding steel wall
    747  3bfb		       ff		      .byte.b	.STRUCT_DELIMITER
------- FILE BANK_GENERIC.asm
     11  3bfc
      0  3bfc					      CHECK_HALF_BANK_SIZE	"GENERIC_BANK_1 (DECODE_CAVE)"
      1  3bfc
      2  3bfc
      3  3bfc		       03 fc	   .TEMP      =	* - BANK_START
 GENERIC_BANK_1 (DECODE_CAVE) (1K) SIZE =  $3fc , FREE= $4
      4  3bfc					      ECHO	"GENERIC_BANK_1 (DECODE_CAVE)", "(1K) SIZE = ", .TEMP, ", FREE=", ROM_BANK_SIZE/2 - .TEMP
      5  3bfc				  -	      if	( .TEMP ) > ROM_BANK_SIZE/2
      6  3bfc				  -	      ECHO	"HALF-BANK OVERFLOW @ ", * - ORIGIN
      7  3bfc				  -	      ERR
      8  3bfc					      endif
     13  3bfc
     14  3bfc							;------------------------------------------------------------------------------
     15  3bfc							; ... the above is a RAM-copied section -- the following is ROM-only.	Note that
     16  3bfc							; we do not configure a 1K boundary, as we con't really care when the above 'RAM'
     17  3bfc							; bank finishes.  Just continue on from where it left off...
     18  3bfc							;------------------------------------------------------------------------------
     19  3bfc
      0  3bfc					      DEFINE_SUBROUTINE	Cart_Init	; in GENERIC_BANK_1
      1  3bfc		       00 07	   BANK_Cart_Init =	_CURRENT_BANK
      2  3bfc					      SUBROUTINE
      3  3bfc				   Cart_Init
     21  3bfc
     22  3bfc							; Note the variables from the title selection are incredibly transient an can be stomped
     23  3bfc							; at any time.  So they need to be used immediately.
     24  3bfc
     25  3bfc
     26  3bfc							; odd usage below is to prevent any possibility of variable stomping/assumptions
     27  3bfc
     28  3bfc		       a5 82		      lda	sCave	; cave # from title select
     29  3bfe		       48		      pha
     30  3bff		       a5 84		      lda	sPlayers
     31  3c01		       a6 83		      ldx	sLevel	; level # from title select
     32  3c03		       a4 85		      ldy	sJoysticks
     33  3c05		       84 ac		      sty	jtoggle
     34  3c07		       86 b1		      stx	level
     35  3c09		       85 ab		      sta	MenCurrent	; = #players
     36  3c0b		       68		      pla
     37  3c0c		       85 b0		      sta	cave	; make an immediate copy to safe variables!
     38  3c0e
     39  3c0e				  -	      IF	FINAL_VERSION
     40  3c0e				  -	      asl
     41  3c0e				  -	      asl
     42  3c0e				  -	      adc	cave	; *5 because it only cycles 0/1/2/3 equaing to caves 0/5/10/15
     43  3c0e				  -	      sta	cave
     44  3c0e					      ENDIF
     45  3c0e		       85 e5		      sta	startCave
     46  3c10
     47  3c10							; multiply with CAVE_DATA_SIZE (5):
     48  3c10		       0a		      asl
     49  3c11		       0a		      asl
     50  3c12		       65 b0		      adc	cave
     51  3c14		       85 b0		      sta	cave
     52  3c16
     53  3c16		       a9 01		      lda	#1
     54  3c18		       85 9e		      sta	whichPlayer	; will switch to 0 on 1st go
     55  3c1a
     56  3c1a		       a9 30		      lda	#NUM_LIVES<<4	; 3 lives
     57  3c1c		       a6 ab		      ldx	MenCurrent	; = sPlayers
     58  3c1e		       f0 02		      beq	opg
     59  3c20		       a9 33		      lda	#NUM_LIVES<<4|NUM_LIVES
     60  3c22		       85 ab	   opg	      sta	MenCurrent	; P2P1 nybble each
     61  3c24
     62  3c24							;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
     63  3c24
     64  3c24		       a9 00		      lda	#0
     65  3c26		       8d 83 02 	      sta	SWBCNT	; console I/O always set to INPUT
     66  3c29		       8d 81 02 	      sta	SWACNT	; set controller I/O to INPUT
     67  3c2c		       85 6b		      sta	HMCLR
     68  3c2e
     69  3c2e							; cleanup remains of title screen
     70  3c2e		       85 5b		      sta	GRP0
     71  3c30		       85 5c		      sta	GRP1
     72  3c32		       85 5b		      sta	GRP0
     73  3c34
     74  3c34		       85 8e		      sta	ScreenDrawPhase	; sequences the sections of gameplay/screen drawing
     75  3c36
     76  3c36							;    IFCONST DEBUG_CREATURE
     77  3c36							;		  sta worstTime
     78  3c36							;    ENDIF
     79  3c36
     80  3c36		       a9 04		      lda	#%100	; players/missiles BEHIND BG
     81  3c38		       85 4a		      sta	CTRLPF
     82  3c3a		       85 87		      sta	rnd	; anything non-0
     83  3c3c
     84  3c3c		       a9 ff		      lda	#$FF
     85  3c3e		       85 89		      sta	DrawStackPointer
     86  3c40
     87  3c40		       a9 07		      lda	#DIRECTION_BITS
     88  3c42		       85 a8		      sta	ManLastDirection
     89  3c44
     90  3c44		       a9 00		      lda	#0
     91  3c46							;		  sta ObjStackPtr		  ; object stack index of last entry
     92  3c46							;		  sta ObjStackPtr+1
     93  3c46							;		  sta BlankStackPtr		  ; blank stack index of last entry
     94  3c46							;		  sta ObjStackNum
     95  3c46							;		  sta ObjIterator
     96  3c46
     97  3c46		       85 d4		      sta	sortPtr
     98  3c48		       a9 ff		      lda	#<(-1)
     99  3c4a		       85 d3		      sta	sortRequired
    100  3c4c
    101  3c4c							; read high score from SaveKey and store in highScoreSK,
    102  3c4c							; which is transferred to high score variable in RAM by GeneralScoringSetups
    103  3c4c		       4c 30 f7 	      jmp	ReadSaveKey
    104  3c4f
    105  3c4f							;LEVEL0CREATURE  .byte TYPE_MAN,	  0,	  3,	  5
    106  3c4f							;		  .byte -1
    107  3c4f
    108  3c4f							;------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    109  3c4f
      0  3c4f					      DEFINE_SUBROUTINE	SwapPlayersGeneric
      1  3c4f		       00 07	   BANK_SwapPlayersGeneric =	_CURRENT_BANK
      2  3c4f					      SUBROUTINE
      3  3c4f				   SwapPlayersGeneric
    111  3c4f
    112  3c4f							; at the start of a cave (or player, doesn't matter) we grab the current state of the colour/B&W switch
    113  3c4f							; into the gameMode variable.
    114  3c4f
    115  3c4f		       a5 80		      lda	gameMode
    116  3c51		       29 77		      and	#~(BW_SWITCH|GAMEMODE_PAUSED)
    117  3c53		       85 80		      sta	gameMode
    118  3c55		       ad 82 02 	      lda	SWCHB
    119  3c58		       29 08		      and	#BW_SWITCH
    120  3c5a		       05 80		      ora	gameMode	; COLOR/B&W @start of level stored in gameMode -- so now we just detect a CHANGE is pause
    121  3c5c		       85 80		      sta	gameMode	; also, BIT7=0 -- system is NOT paused
    122  3c5e
    123  3c5e
    124  3c5e							; restart cave
    125  3c5e		       a5 c9		      lda	NextLevelTrigger
    126  3c60		       29 bf		      and	#<(~BIT_NEXTLIFE)
    127  3c62		       85 c9		      sta	NextLevelTrigger
    128  3c64
    129  3c64							; swap player and lives, returns C-flag = 1 if player is dead
    130  3c64
    131  3c64		       a5 ab		      lda	MenCurrent
    132  3c66		       29 f0		      and	#$F0	; other player has lives left?
    133  3c68		       f0 12		      beq	.playerDead2	; NO, so we don't swap scores
    134  3c6a
    135  3c6a		       a5 9e		      lda	whichPlayer
    136  3c6c		       49 01		      eor	#1
    137  3c6e		       85 9e		      sta	whichPlayer
    138  3c70
    139  3c70							; switch nybbles over -- the low 4 bits holds current player's life count
    140  3c70
    141  3c70		       a5 ab		      lda	MenCurrent
    142  3c72		       a2 04		      ldx	#4
    143  3c74		       c9 80	   .swapNybble cmp	#$80
    144  3c76		       2a		      rol
    145  3c77		       ca		      dex
    146  3c78		       d0 fa		      bne	.swapNybble
    147  3c7a		       85 ab		      sta	MenCurrent	; only 0 when BOTH players dead :))
    148  3c7c
    149  3c7c				   .playerDead2
    150  3c7c							; if new high score was set by SwapPlayers, update it:
    151  3c7c		       4c 56 f7 	      jmp	WriteSaveKey
    152  3c7f
    153  3c7f
    154  3c7f							;------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    155  3c7f
      0  3c7f					      DEFINE_SUBROUTINE	CreateCreatures	; GENERIC_BANK_1
      1  3c7f		       00 07	   BANK_CreateCreatures =	_CURRENT_BANK
      2  3c7f					      SUBROUTINE
      3  3c7f				   CreateCreatures
    157  3c7f
    158  3c7f
    159  3c7f							; Calculate rightmost value for scrolling edge.  .
    160  3c7f
    161  3c7f		       85 c3		      sta	ROM_Bank
    162  3c81
    163  3c81		       38		      sec
    164  3c82		       a5 98		      lda	BoardLimit_Width
    165  3c84		       e9 09		      sbc	#SCREEN_WIDTH-1
    166  3c86		       85 98		      sta	BoardEdge_Right	; absolute rightmost scroll value
    167  3c88				  -	      IF	INITIAL_SCROLL = YES
    168  3c88				  -	      sbc	#1
    169  3c88				  -	      cmp	BoardScrollX
    170  3c88				  -	      bcs	.Xok
    171  3c88				  -	      sta	BoardScrollX
    172  3c88				  -	      sec
    173  3c88				  -.Xok
    174  3c88					      ENDIF
    175  3c88
    176  3c88							;		  sec			     already set
    177  3c88		       a5 99		      lda	BoardLimit_Height
    178  3c8a		       e9 07		      sbc	#SCREEN_LINES-1
    179  3c8c		       85 99		      sta	BoardEdge_Bottom	; absolute bottommost scroll value
    180  3c8e				  -	      IF	INITIAL_SCROLL = YES
    181  3c8e				  -	      sbc	#1
    182  3c8e				  -	      cmp	BoardScrollY
    183  3c8e				  -	      bcs	.Yok
    184  3c8e				  -	      sta	BoardScrollY
    185  3c8e				  -.Yok
    186  3c8e					      ENDIF
    187  3c8e
    188  3c8e							; kludge position scroll roughly at player
    189  3c8e
    190  3c8e							;TODO: "correct" BD scrolling.
    191  3c8e							; The game scrolls from the players last position (no difference between 1st and 2nd player)
    192  3c8e
    193  3c8e					      IF	INITIAL_SCROLL = NO
    194  3c8e							;		  sec			 already set
    195  3c8e		       a5 9f		      lda	ManX
    196  3c90		       e9 05		      sbc	#5
    197  3c92		       b0 02		      bcs	notL0
    198  3c94		       a9 00		      lda	#0
    199  3c96		       85 9b	   notL0      sta	BoardScrollX
    200  3c98
    201  3c98
    202  3c98		       38		      sec
    203  3c99		       a5 a0		      lda	ManY
    204  3c9b		       e9 05		      sbc	#5	; TJ: why 5???
    205  3c9d		       b0 02		      bcs	notU0
    206  3c9f		       a9 00		      lda	#0
    207  3ca1		       85 9a	   notU0      sta	BoardScrollY
    208  3ca3					      ENDIF
    209  3ca3
    210  3ca3		       a9 00		      lda	#0
    211  3ca5		       85 a3		      sta	ManMode
    212  3ca7		       85 a4		      sta	ManDelayCount
    213  3ca9

    215  3cab		       85 a5		      sta	ManAnimation
    216  3cad							;lda #>AnimateBLANK ;

    221  3cb1

      0  3d05					      DEFINE_SUBROUTINE	Resync
      1  3d05		       00 07	   BANK_Resync =	_CURRENT_BANK
      2  3d05					      SUBROUTINE
      3  3d05				   Resync
      0  3d05					      RESYNC
      1  3d05
      2  3d05		       a9 02		      lda	#%10
      3  3d07		       85 41		      sta	VBLANK
      4  3d09
      5  3d09		       a2 08		      ldx	#8
      6  3d0b				   .loopResync
      0  3d0b					      VERTICAL_SYNC
      1  3d0b		       a9 0e		      lda	#%1110
      2  3d0d		       85 42	   .VSLP1     sta	WSYNC
      3  3d0f		       85 40		      sta	VSYNC
      4  3d11		       4a		      lsr
      5  3d12		       d0 f9		      bne	.VSLP1
      8  3d14
      9  3d14		       a0 88		      ldy	#SCANLINES_NTSC/2 - 2
     10  3d16		       a5 81		      lda	Platform
     11  3d18		       49 02		      eor	#PAL_50
     12  3d1a		       d0 02		      bne	.ntsc
     13  3d1c		       a0 9a		      ldy	#SCANLINES_PAL/2 - 2
     14  3d1e				   .ntsc
     15  3d1e				   .loopWait
     16  3d1e		       85 42		      sta	WSYNC
     17  3d20		       85 42		      sta	WSYNC
     18  3d22		       88		      dey
     19  3d23		       d0 f9		      bne	.loopWait
     20  3d25		       ca		      dex
     21  3d26		       d0 e3		      bne	.loopResync
    296  3d28		       60	   Ret	      rts

    299  3d29				   Manimate

    301  3d29				   AnimateSTOPPED
    302  3d29		       7f		      .byte.b	127
    303  3d2a		       79		      .byte.b	<PLAYER_STAND
    304  3d2b		       0a		      .byte.b	10
    305  3d2c		       8e		      .byte.b	< PLAYER_BLINK
    306  3d2d		       7f		      .byte.b	127
    307  3d2e		       79		      .byte.b	< PLAYER_STAND
    308  3d2f							;.byte 0
    309  3d2f							;.word AnimateTAP
    310  3d2f
    311  3d2f				   AnimateTAP
    312  3d2f		       80 00		      .byte.b	128, %0	; reflect off, always tap with left foot
    313  3d31		       08		      .byte.b	8
    314  3d32		       a3		      .byte.b	< PLAYER_TAP0
    315  3d33		       08		      .byte.b	8
    316  3d34		       b8		      .byte.b	< PLAYER_TAP1
    317  3d35		       08		      .byte.b	8
    318  3d36		       a3		      .byte.b	< PLAYER_TAP0
    319  3d37		       08		      .byte.b	8
    320  3d38		       b8		      .byte.b	< PLAYER_TAP1
    321  3d39		       08		      .byte.b	8
    322  3d3a		       a3		      .byte.b	< PLAYER_TAP0
    323  3d3b		       08		      .byte.b	8
    324  3d3c		       b8		      .byte.b	< PLAYER_TAP1
    325  3d3d		       00		      .byte.b	0
    326  3d3e		       00		      .byte.b	AnimateSTAND-Manimate	;word AnimateSTAND
    327  3d3f
    328  3d3f				   AnimateRIGHT
